description: Unlocks housing tiers 4 and higher.
Gives +1 melon per melon broken.
Increases the speed of faster cooking and faster selling from 5 to 8.
You get more gold from jailing players that have contraband on them.
Deposits of gold into the city bank adds an extra 0.25 gold to the bank for free.
The time you spend in jail is reduced by 3 seconds, and you can only be jailed at 8 health rather than at 10 health.
You get +1 gold from selling melons.
Strange brews give one extra effect and heal one extra heart.
You get more gold and golden carrots from collecting imports.
If you have your banks unlocked, you generate 1 enchanted melon slice for every 8 seconds you're on the plot.
You have a +0.1 boost to sell price when you sell melons to the merchant.
Stranger brews take 100 less seconds to make.
You unlock the Expert Shop.
You get a 10% discount when crafting hoes.
Attempting to enter the Black Market opens the door for twice as long as it usually does.
You slowly but passively generate gold for your personal bank while farming.
If faster cooking/selling are not bought, sneaking increases the speed of cooking/selling respectively from 1 to 2.
You gain access to the extra area in the Arcane Workshop.
Your Emergency Grenades come with a free sword.
Your autosmelter smelts melons 50% faster.
The Searching statistic on your hoe becomes 0.4% per level instead of 0.3%
